value.title: Let's Talk Power BI Gateways
value.excerpt: Join us live as we talk about Power BI gateways! The what and why regarding them and some things to consider when using a gateway.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-gateway-onprem  Gateway monitor report: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-performance

value.title: LEVEL UP Power BI Conditional Drill with Paginated reports!
value.excerpt: Take Power BI Conditional Drill to the next level by incorporating Paginated reports with your strategy! Patrick shows a customer scenario that he solved using this approach.  Paginated reports doc: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/paginated-reports/paginated-reports-report-builder-power-bi  Power

value.title: Mark as Date Table in Power BI Desktop is here!
value.excerpt: Mark as Date Table in Power BI Desktop is finally here! In this video, Patrick takes what Adam did with a custom date table and shows you how you can use Mark as Date Table in Power BI Desktop. This feature was introduced in the February 2018 release of Power BI Desktop. Mark as Date Table has been available

value.title: Migrate your Paginated reports to Power BI
value.excerpt: Are your paginated reports still on-premises with either Power BI Report Server or SQL Server Reporting Services? Want to move them to Power BI? Patrick shows you how you can do that using the RDLMigration tool!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/guidance/migrate-ssrs-reports-to-power-bi

value.title: My CHECKLIST for troubleshooting Power BI Performance

value.title: 'OraOLEDB.Oracle' provider is not registered
value.excerpt: Highlights an issue that could occur when creating a Data Source within Power BI Admin Center. value.title: Power BI parameters - Updating in the Power BI Service or with APIs
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can update Power BI parameters within the service or by using APIs. You can create Power BI Parameters within Power BI Desktop using Power Query. Then you can update those Power BI parameters once the report is published to the Power BI service.  PowerShell Samples:

value.title: Setting default values using COALESCE in DAX

value.title: Tooltips, tooltips, tooltips in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows how you can display multiple values within a tooltip for a visual. He walks through the DAX measure and also shows some pitfalls to look out for when it comes to filter context.  Go here for the sample DAX statement: https://guyinacube.com/2017/06/tooltips-tooltips-tooltips-power-bi/

value.title: Using DAX to format a list of values in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Alberto Ferrari joins Patrick to walk through how you can use DAX to format a list of values within Power BI Desktop. Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/

value.title: Using different languages with the Power BI site
value.excerpt: I look at how your browser languages affect what is displayed. This all comes down to your browsers and the language settings within. Different browsers are configured differently. value.title: What is a Power BI tenant? (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)

value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Adam explores the data protection capabilities within Power BI using security labels and cloud app security.  Data Protection documentation overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-security-data-protection-overview
